title: Potatoes For Profit: The Pros And Cons of Potato Farming | EP 132

subtasks: Research suitable land and regions for potato farming.
Assess soil suitability for potato cultivation.
Consider potential pests and diseases affecting potatoes.
Evaluate market demand and pricing for potatoes.
Initialize small-scale potato farming to manage risk.
Use certified seed potatoes to minimize disease risk.
Implement irrigation systems for water management.
Apply appropriate chemical treatments, including nematode control (e.g., Vellum Prime) and fungicide treatments (e.g., Antreco Follicure Nativo, Desis, Bulldog, Belfort).
Monitor weather conditions and adjust spraying programs as needed.
Maintain proper potato plant density based on soil analysis and guidance.
Partner with industry associations (like Potato South Africa) for expert advice and risk management.
Attend workgroups and demonstrations hosted by industry partners to stay informed about new innovations and best practices.
Collaborate with Bayer Crop Division for crop protection strategies and soil management.

tasks.task: Mitigate risks associated with potato farming.
subtasks: Develop a proactive spray program to prevent pest and disease outbreaks.
Adjust crop protection strategies based on emerging weather patterns.
Regularly update chemical treatments as per product labels and expert recommendations.
Monitor and adapt to changing weather conditions, adjusting irrigation and fertilization practices accordingly.

tasks.task: Manage potato spraying and chemical application.
subtasks: Apply fungicide treatments to control fungal diseases during the growing season.
Use insecticides to manage moth diseases (e.g., Bulldog, Belfort).
Employ products targeting nematode control (e.g., Vellum Prime and Emester Silver).
Rotate chemicals to prevent resistance development.

tasks.task: Protect potato yield and quality through chemical management.
subtasks: Prevent racemogenic compounds in potatoes with Emester Silver.
Ensure tuber quality by minimizing pest and disease damage.
Apply products to protect against leaf miner (while recognizing Bayer may not cover all necessary chemical needs).

tasks.task: Adapt to water scarcity in dryland farming.
subtasks: Utilize water management techniques for optimal potato growth under limited rainfall.
Dialogue with Eastern Free State farmers for tailored advice on dryland cultivation practices.
Collaborate with Potato South Africa and Potato Certification Services for information sharing.
Participate in workgroups to address specific farming challenges and access localized advice.
